Courses we offer

Basic barber course

This course teaches essential skills like hair cutting, shaving, and beard trimming for men. Trainees learn to use tools like scissors, clippers, and razors and graduate with the knowledge to work in a barbershop or salon..

Advanced barber course

The advanced barber course is for barbers who want to enhance their skills and knowledge. It covers advanced techniques in hair cutting, styling, grooming & shaving. Students get hands-on training with real clients to refine their skills and build their confidence.

Master barber course

A master barber course covers the most advanced techniques in hair cutting, styling, grooming, shaving, and business management. Students get extensive hands-on training with real clients to hone their skills and perfect their craft. Graduates will have the skills and knowledge to be leaders in this industry
